stories.text:
We're building a wearable EEG to improve sleep performance, and our unit economics look quite good, but I keep hearing about challenges in hardware from companies that have 70%+ markup on their hardware.

What am I missing or not understanding?
stories.title: Ask HN: Hardware startup? What surprised you about forecasting your business?

stories.text: In theory, it would be uneconomical to own a car and you could commute just about anywhere as fast as a subway ride, cheap as a bus ticket, and comfortably as an UberXL. How will this change cities and transportation?
